snippet: The high-altitude roads of the Peruvian Andes are notorious for bus accidents like the one that occurred Friday. Last year, more than 4,000 people were killed in such accidents.
abstract: Makeshift bus in Peru plunges off cliff into river, killing all 51 people on board.
lead_paragraph: The high-altitude roads of the Peruvian Andes are notorious for bus accidents like the one that occurred Friday. Last year, more than 4,000 people were killed in such accidents.

headline.main: Bus Plunges Off Cliff in Peru, Killing 51
headline.print_headline: Bus Plunges Off Cliff in Peru, Killing 51
